casebody.data:
CURRAN, Respondent, v. GALEN et al., Appellants. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fifth Department. March 27, 1894.) Action by Charles Curran against Lewis Galen, as president, etc., and others.

Argued before DWIGHT, P. J., and LEWIS, HAIGHT, and BRADLEY, JJ.

No opinion. Interlocutory judgment appealed from affirmed, with costs, with leave to amend answer within 20 days, upon payment of the costs of this appeal and of the demurrer, on the opinion of Adams, J., at the special term. 22 N. Y. Supp. 826.
